title: Maintenance Work on Punggol LRT System

title_translations.zh-Hans: 榜鹅轻轨系统维修工程
title_translations.ms: Kerja Penyelenggaraan di Sistem LRT Punggol

updates.text:
We will be conducting maintenance work on the Punggol LRT system this Sunday, 1 April 2018. 
‍‍‍‍‍‍ ‍‍
Train service will be available as usual at all stations, but only in one direction. Service in the opposite direction will start at 7am. https://t.co/Hcejpz5qjQ
